title: AI chatbot-integrated nursing simulation-based education course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary nursing knowledge and mobile device operation skills
context.additional_context: Emergency planning simulation training program operating in smartphone-based constrained technological environments

learning_goals: In AI chatbot-assisted nursing simulation scenarios, learners can select at least three appropriate emergency measures based on patient conditions
Learners can analyze decision-making processes in simulation environments through interactions with AI chatbots according to structured evaluation rubrics
Learners can submit project deliverables improving simulation prompt design and interaction strategies based on AI chatbot feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
